name: Hotel FAQ Research Generator
description: יוצר שאלות נפוצות למלון על בסיס מחקר SEO
template:
SEO & GEO FAQ Research Prompt for Questions
Hotel Name: {{hotel_name}}

1 Goal
Research and compile a list of real, high-frequency questions (from Google, TripAdvisor, Booking.com, social media, forums, etc.) about {{hotel_name}}. Each question must be ready for the hotel's FAQ page; no answers are required in this step.

2 Required columns (in this exact order)
Category
Question
Frequency Level

Guidelines
• Question – clear, complete, self-contained.
• Every question must contain the full hotel name {{hotel_name}} unless it's an immediate follow-up question.
• Always use third person ("Does {{hotel_name}} …") – never second person.
• Group logically: broad question first, then its follow-ups.
• Frequency Level – tag High / Medium / Low based on observed prevalence.

3 Categories
Provide 7–10 unique questions per category, ordered from general to specific:
General Information
Accommodation & Room Services
Food & Beverage
Policies & Terms (pets, smoking, cancellation, check-in/out, etc.)
Location & Transportation
Activities & Entertainment
[Add an extra category only if really needed]

4 Quality & Authenticity Rules
Source only questions that genuinely appear online; refine wording for a luxury-hotel tone.
No duplicates or near-paraphrases.
Highlight features typical of a luxury urban hotel.
Language: English, clear and professional for an international audience.
Ensure 90% of all questions include the full hotel name.
Ordering within each category flows naturally from broad to specific.

5 Delivery
Return the FAQ as a formatted table (Markdown is fine) with the three columns above. No file download or external spreadsheet is required. Don't add links or sources.

Additional Requirements:
First characterize this specific hotel and what makes it unique, then add questions that could only be asked about this particular hotel based on its unique audience and characteristics.

Reference list for potential questions (check relevance):
- Free Wi-Fi availability
- 24-hour front desk service
- Check-in & check-out times
- Family-friendly facilities
- Accessible facilities
- Multilingual staff
- On-site parking
- Meeting & conference facilities
- Minibar/small fridge in rooms
- Tea & coffee-making facilities
- Air-conditioning and heating
- Buffet breakfast
- Rooftop bar with city views
- Proximity to St Paul's Cathedral
- Nearest Underground station
- Airport shuttle service
- Indoor swimming pool
- Spa massage treatments
- Pet policy
- Smoking policy
- Group booking conditions
